name: Blue Boy
description: Blue Boy is a cross of popular favorites Blue Dream and Northern Lights #5 that will give you anything but the blues. Originally from Washington state, this sativa-dominant hybrid provides focused, cerebral effects that make it a great choice for daytime use. Its plants are bushy and grow large, and the flowers tend to be large and on the looser, leafier side. Blue Boy is a potent strain with THC levels that often test over 20%.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Giggly, Creative, Uplifted, Stress, Pain, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Fatigue, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Dizzy, Paranoid
